Ombudsman: ASN di Jakarta Tak Mampu Jalankan Program Kerja
04 Nov 2019, 13:24 by iman


Ombudsman: ASN di Jakarta Tak Mampu Jalankan Program Kerja

KBRN, Jakarta-Ombudsman Jakarta Raya mengkritik kinerja Aparatur Sipil Negara (ASN) di lingkungan Pemerintah Provinsi DKI Jakarta.  Kepala Perwakilan Ombudsman Jakarta Raya, Teguh Nugroho menilai  kinerja ASN  di Jakarta belumlah menggembirakan dengan serapan anggaran dari masing-masing SKPD masih sangat rendah. Untuk itu, Kemenpan RB harus menuntaskan PP terkait gaji dan tunjangan ASN.  
"Ini menunjukan para ASN di Jakarta tidak mampu menjalankan program kerja yang mereka susun sendiri untuk menjalankan kebijakan politik pimpinannya,"kata Teguh Nugroho di Jakarta. Senin (4/11/2019) kepada rri.co.id. 
Menurut Teguh rendahnya kinerja ASN di Jakarta berdasarkan meningkatnya jumlah laporan ke Ombusman Jakarta Raya. 
"Ini bisa menjadi salah satu indikator, bahwa warga tidak puas terhadap pelayanan para ASN di DKI di level outcome. Mungkin di level output capaian ASN DKI meningkat, seperti banyaknya jumlah kegiatan, rapat-rapat, acara-acara seremonial,"terangnya.  
Selain itu,  lanjutnya dari sisi implementasi kebijakan tidak banyak laporan yang masuk ke Ombudsman Jakarta Raya disebabkan buruknya koordinasi antar SKPD  dalam dan keenganan para pemimpin SKPD di Jakarta untuk mengambil keputusan-keputusan strategis. 
"Dalam banyak kasus, ketika ada temuan dan harus ada perbaikan yang mereka lakukan, para pimpinan SKPD ini malah meinta ombudsman untuk menyampaikan tindakan korektif tersebut kepada gubernur dan kemudian gubernur memerintahkan mereka atas tindakan korektif tersebut,"paparnya.
"Padahal,  itu kebijakan yang harusnya diputuskan di level mereka tidak harus sampai ke level gubernur,"tambahnya.  
Problem ketiga, menurut Teguh banyak ASN di Jakarta miskin dengan inovasi dan perubahan.  
"Banyak yang lebih suka menunggu perintah dan kebijakan atasan. Mungkin karena salah satunya efek dari tingginya TKD ASn di Jakarta, mereka manjadi tidak terdorong untuk mengambil resiko, inovatif dan bekerjasama antar SKPD, bekerja bussines as usual saja, TKD nya tetap tinggi,"tandasnya.
Menurut Teguh harusnya ada pembedaan antara ASN  yang berani berinovasi, mengambil resiko menjalankan kebijakan selama itu berada di dalam rencana program kerja dan aktif membangun kerjasama antar SKPD. 
Teguh menilai koordinasi ini juga bisa disebabkan belum adanya wagub yang definitif, sementara gubernur harus menghandle terlalu banyak isu dan masalah yang ternyata tidak bisa di tangani oleh Sekda dan tim TGUPP yang tadinya diharapkan bisa membantu koordinasi antar SKPD di Jakarta.
"Jadi kami mendukung upaya Kemenpan RB untuk menuntaskan PP terkait gaji dan tunjangan ASN, termasuk gaji dan tunjangan ASN di Jakarta,"pungkasnya.

Ombudsman: ASN in Jakarta Unable to Run a Work Program
Nov. 04, 2019, 13:24 by faith


Ombudsman: ASN in Jakarta Unable to Run a Work Program

KBRN, Jakarta-Greater Jakarta Ombudsman criticized the performance of the State Civil Apparatus (ASN) within the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government. Head of the Greater Jakarta Ombudsman Representative, Teguh Nugroho, assessed that the performance of ASN in Jakarta was not yet encouraging with the budget absorption from each SKPD being very low. For this reason, Kemenpan RB must complete the PP related to ASN salaries and benefits.
"This shows that the ASNs in Jakarta are unable to carry out their own work programs to carry out their leaders' political policies," Teguh Nugroho said in Jakarta. Monday (4/11/2019) to rri.co.id.
According to Teguh, the low performance of ASN in Jakarta was based on the increasing number of reports to Ombusman Greater Jakarta.
"This can be one indicator, that citizens are not satisfied with the service of ASNs in DKI at the outcome level. Maybe at the level of output the achievements of ASN DKI have increased, such as the large number of activities, meetings, ceremonial events," he explained.
In addition, he continued from the policy implementation point of view, not many reports went into the Greater Jakarta Ombudsman due to poor coordination between SKPDs and the reluctance of SKPD leaders in Jakarta to make strategic decisions.
"In many cases, when there are findings and there must be improvements that they do, the SKPD leaders instead asked the ombudsman to convey the corrective action to the governor and then the governor ordered them for the corrective action," he explained.
"In fact, it is a policy that should be decided at their level, it does not have to reach the level of the governor," he added.
The third problem, according to Teguh, many ASNs in Jakarta are poor with innovation and change.
"Many prefer to wait for orders and policies from superiors. Maybe because one of them is the effect of the high ASD TKD in Jakarta, they are not motivated to take risks, be innovative and cooperate among SKPD, work as usual, the TKD remains high," he said .
According to Teguh there should be a distinction between ASNs who dare to innovate, take the risk of implementing policies as long as they are in the work program plan and actively build cooperation between SKPDs.
Teguh assessed that this coordination could also be caused by the absence of a definitive Deputy Governor, while the governor had to handle too many issues and problems that were apparently unable to be handled by the Regional Secretary and TGUPP team who had been expected to be able to assist coordination between SKPD in Jakarta.
"So we support the efforts of Kemenpan RB to complete PPs related to ASN salaries and benefits, including ASN salaries and benefits in Jakarta," he concluded.
